channel.title: accounting on stretcht - stretching the limits of your mind

item.title: Week 20 - 2023
item.content:
grow

Instead of your Life’s Purpose - by existentialpervert69 (philosophyinhell.substack.com) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - A meditation on meaning. { #meaning #purpose }

Get started | Learning Music (learningmusic.ableton.com) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - In these lessons, you’ll learn the basics of music making. No prior experience or equipment is required; you’ll do everything right here in your browser. { #music }

62 New Moons Discovered Orbiting Saturn Using Innovative Astronomy (scitechdaily.com) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - An international team of astronomers has found 62 new moons around Saturn using an innovative technique. These irregular moons contribute to Saturnâ€™s total moon count of 145, surpassing Jupiter, and provide insights into the planetâ€™s moon systemâ€™s collisional history. { #space #saturn }

My Inventions Nikola Tesla : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive (archive.org) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - My Inventions Nikola Tesla { #tesla #inventions }

James Webb’s ’too massive’ galaxies may be even more massive (phys.org) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - The first results from the James Webb Space Telescope have hinted at galaxies so early and so massive that they are in tension with our understanding of the formation of structure in the universe. Various explanations have been proposed that may alleviate this tension. But now a new study from the Cosmic Dawn Center suggests an effect which has never before been studied at such early epochs, indicating that the galaxies may be even more massive. { #galaxy #universe }

tech

Diving into a hidden macOS tool - networkQuality (cyberhost.uk) - The networkQuality tool is a built-in tool released in macOS Monterey that can help diagnose network issues and measure network performance. In this post, we’ll go over how to use the networkQuality tool and some of its key features. { #tool #macos }

Vimcasts - Free screencasts about the text editor Vim (vimcasts.org) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - Free screencasts about the text editor Vim { #vim }

README.md - snips.sh (snips.sh) - SSH-powered pastebin with a human-friendly TUI and web UI { #tool #cli }

GigaBrain - Search Reddit and Other Communities for Answers from Real People (thegigabrain.com) - GigaBrain scans billions of discussions on reddit and other online communities to find the most useful posts and comments for you { #reddit #community }

misc

laptopfriendly (laptopfriendly.co) - From coffee shops to hotel lobbies, discover everyday places to work and connect. { #wifi #coworking }

BookFinder.com: New & Used Books, Rare Books, Textbooks (bookfinder.com) - Find cheapest used books, rare books, textbooks, new and out-of-print books { #books }

Sortabase | Collaborative, visual databases by communities (sortabase.com) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - We built Sortabase to let communities collaborate on visual databases of the things they know and care about. { #database #community }

Cyberpunk Radio - Free 24/7 Live Streaming | Rekt FM (rekt.network) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - Tune in to high-quality, 320kbps electronic music including Synthwave, Cyberpunk, Darksynth, EBSM, Midtempo, Industrial, Dark Techno, Drum & Bass genres and much more. { #music }

Orb.Farm (orb.farm) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - This is your personal aquatic ecosystem to nurture, sculpt, and observe. { #game #chill }

Rooms.xyz (rooms.xyz) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - Create & remix interactive rooms from your browser { #game #chill }

Plain Text Accounting portal - plaintextaccounting.org (plaintextaccounting.org) | [ðŸ’¬ discussion] - Plain text accounting is a way of doing bookkeeping and accounting with plain text files and scriptable, command-line-friendly software, such as Ledger, hledger, or Beancount. { #tool #accounting }
